content: fingerless mitts 1/2 yarn debbie bliss rialto 4 ply 100% merino wool gauge 28st 36 row to 10cm needles 1 set 5 3 25mm dp sock needles also 3 stitch holders to hold up to 16 stitches each stitch markers - helpful but not essential size 1 - medium size 2 - for longer fingers both sizes - cuff 12 cm long hand size 1 - 11cm size 2 - 12 25cm pattern is the same for right and left hands 1 cuff - both sizes using thumb method c/o 49 st transfer onto 3 dp needles as follows 16 16 17 slip 17th stitch on 3rd needle over 1st stitch on 1st needle to join together in round taking care not to twist knitting r 1 - 43 k2 p2 4 times on each needle to create 12 ribs 16 16 16 = 48st knit 43 row of double rib in the round - cuff will be about 12cm long r 44 45 knit two row st stitch 2 thumb increase - both sizes at start of next round introduce another needle for thumb - this will be needle 1 knit in stocking stitch r 46 needle 1 k1 k into back of stitch kbs k4 k into back of last stitch 7 needle 2 knit 11 needle 3 knit 16 needle 4 knit 16 nb this pattern for needles 2 3 and 4 stays the same for row 46-65 of the thumb increase r 47 48 49 knit in round without any increases r 50 needle 1 k1 kbs k6 kbs 9 r 51 52 53 knit r 54 needle 1 k1 kbs k8 kbs 11 r 55 56 57 knit r 58 needle 1 k1 kbs k10 kbs 13 r 59 60 61 knit r 62 needle 1 k1 kbs k12 kbs 15 r 63 64 65 knit r 66 needle 1 k1 kbs k14 kbs 17 3 thumb transfer stitches from needles 2 3 and 4 onto 3 stitch holders transfer 17 thumb stitches from needle 1 onto 3 dp needles as follows 6 6 5 c/o 1 stitch on last needle and slip over 1st stitch of 1st needle to join in the round taking care not to twist knitting size 1 - knit 9 row in round st st and cast off in knit - not too tightly size 2 - knit 11 row in round st st and cast off in knit - not too tightly © anne dobedoe may 2010 fingerless mitts 2/2 transfer stitches from stitch holders back onto the dp needles to give needle 1 -
